title: Unnamed
content:
**Idea**   
Use only odd pixels within 13 vertical pixels.
author: brianbaker

comments.content:
Give a little, take a little...   
   
 ![wn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414205435im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/2027.gif)

I need to stop being so post-happy.   
I'm going to stop looking at it for a while.   
   
 ![again](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414205435im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/2028.gif)

Ooo, clean and descenderless. Very nice.   
This could easily translate to vector too.   
   
Stephen

I thought it would be neat to squeeze things together. After I did that, it seemed like there needed to be a bold weight. Now that I've done that I think the "V", "W", "X", "Y", "v", and "w" seem a little out of place. Maybe even the "m", "n", and "r". I like the characters on their own, but just not sure they fit. Hum, maybe even the "G", "3", and "4". The compact version needs some kerning, maybe that has something to do with it...
